items.prompt: What are the company's vacation policies?
items.context: Employees receive 15 days of paid vacation per year, accruing at 1.25 days per month. Unused vacation can be carried over up to 5 days into the next year.
items.output: According to the company policy, employees get 15 days of paid vacation annually, which accrues monthly at 1.25 days. You can carry over up to 5 unused days to the next year.
items.expected: 15 days paid vacation per year with up to 5 days carryover.

items.prompt: What is the return policy for electronics?
items.context: Electronics can be returned within 30 days of purchase with original packaging and receipt. Items must be in new condition. Restocking fee of 15% applies.
items.output: You can return electronics within 30 days if they're in new condition with original packaging and receipt. There's a 15% restocking fee.
items.expected: 30-day return window with 15% restocking fee, requires original packaging and receipt.

items.prompt: How do I reset my password?
items.context: To reset your password, click 'Forgot Password' on the login page. Enter your email address and you'll receive a reset link valid for 24 hours. Click the link and create a new password with at least 8 characters.
items.output: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email, and you'll get a reset link that's valid for 24 hours. Use it to create a new password (minimum 8 characters).
items.expected: Use 'Forgot Password' link, receive email with 24-hour reset link, create new password with 8+ characters.

items.context: Standard shipping is $5.99 for orders under $50. Free shipping on orders over $50. Express shipping available for $12.99 with 2-day delivery.
items.output: Shipping costs $5.99 for orders under $50, but it's free for orders over $50. Express 2-day shipping is available for $12.99.
items.expected: Standard: $5.99 under $50, free over $50. Express: $12.99 for 2-day delivery.

items.prompt: What programming languages are required for the job?
items.context: Required: Python, JavaScript. Preferred: TypeScript, Go, Rust. Experience with React and Node.js is essential.
items.output: The position requires Python and JavaScript, with React and Node.js experience being essential. TypeScript, Go, and Rust are preferred but not required.
items.expected: Required: Python, JavaScript, React, Node.js. Preferred: TypeScript, Go, Rust.

items.context: All products come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship. Extended warranties available for purchase.
items.output: Products include a 1-year manufacturer warranty that covers defects in materials and workmanship. You can also purchase extended warranty coverage.
items.expected: 1-year manufacturer warranty for defects, with optional extended warranty purchase.

items.context: Office hours are Monday-Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM EST. Customer support available 24/7 via chat and email.
items.output: The office is open Monday through Friday from 9 AM to 5 PM Eastern Time. However, customer support is available 24/7 through chat and email.
items.expected: Office: Mon-Fri 9 AM-5 PM EST. Support: 24/7 via chat/email.

items.prompt: How do I cancel my subscription?
items.context: To cancel, go to Account Settings > Subscriptions > Cancel Subscription. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period. No refunds for partial months.
items.output: Navigate to Account Settings, then Subscriptions, and click Cancel Subscription. Your cancellation will be effective at the end of your current billing period, with no partial refunds.
items.expected: Cancel via Account Settings > Subscriptions. Takes effect end of billing period, no partial refunds.

items.context: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, PayPal, and Apple Pay. Cryptocurrency payments not currently supported.
items.output: We accept major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover), as well as PayPal and Apple Pay. Cryptocurrency is not supported at this time.
items.expected: Credit cards (Visa, MC, Amex, Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay. No crypto.

items.prompt: What is the minimum order quantity?
items.context: No minimum order quantity for retail customers. Wholesale orders require minimum of 100 units. Bulk discounts available for orders over 500 units.
items.output: There's no minimum order for retail customers. Wholesale orders need at least 100 units, and bulk discounts kick in at 500+ units.
items.expected: Retail: no minimum. Wholesale: 100 units minimum. Bulk discounts at 500+.
